scripts.rsync: yarn run rsync:medusa && yarn run rsync:storefront
scripts.watch: nodemon -e js,jsx,ts,tsx --watch "medusa-plugin/src" --spawn --exec "cd medusa-plugin && yarn run prepare && cd .. && yarn run rsync && cd dev/medusa && yarn run dev" --delay 1 --verbose
scripts.start: yarn run generate:medusa-api && cd medusa-plugin && yarn run prepare && cd .. && yarn run rsync && cd dev/medusa && yarn run build && cd ../.. && concurrently "yarn run watch" "cd dev/medusa-storefront && yarn run dev" --timings --prefix "[{index}] [{time}] =>"
scripts.generate:medusa-api:store: node --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning --loader ts-node/esm ./dev/scripts/generate-medusa-client.ts store && cd dev/store-client && yarn run prepare && cd ../.. && cp -R dev/store-client/dist/ medusa-plugin/store-client/
scripts.generate:medusa-api: yarn run generate:medusa-api:admin && yarn run generate:medusa-api:store
